
## Benchmark

Compare `mercantile`, `utiles` and `morecantile`

```sh
python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
python -m pytest benchmarks.py --benchmark-only --benchmark-columns 'min, max, mean, median' --benchmark-sort 'min'
```
